content: knit a custom sized sweater for your special dog darling darby sweater instructions includes fill-in-the-blank places for your calculations along with step-by-step instructions for each section of the sweater or use the custom calculation worksheet that is included with * darling darby sweater * to determine your stitch counts increases & decreases before you start to knit or use the link for the online darling darby calculator now included in the pattern sizing is based on your dog s measurements and your gauge yes you should make a gauge swatch so there is some measuring & math - nothing hard and examples are provided if your dog is like mine the hardest measurement to take is the shoulder - they want to help * the more accurate the shoulder measurement the better the neck/shoulder fit will be be sure to measure from the dog s backbone between their shoulder blades ~ where their neck joins their body ~ to just behind & below their front armpit add your chosen ease to that measurement for the final shoulder length figure if the neck pulls down the shoulder measurement is too short * visit my web site ~ desert rose fiber arts 1 ~ to obtain your **free** copy of darling darby sweater while darling darby sweater is free you do need to go through the checkout process to receive a download link creating an account is completely voluntary and while visiting check out the darling darby gallery 2 to see how knitters around the world have customized this sweater and made it their own for tips on customizing * darling darby * ~ visit the it s darling darby time 3 thread in my desert rose fiber arts group 1 https //www desertrosefiberarts com/ 2 https //www desertrosefiberarts com/darling-darby-gallery/ 3 http //www ravelry com/discuss/desert-rose-fiber-arts/3043157/1-25
